components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI

fields.summary: Android: SearchBar not working with custom data row in TableView.
fields.environment:
OS: OSX Mountain Lion.
Hardware: Mac Mini 2012.
Software: Titanium Studio 2.1.2.20120830612
Emulator: Android 2.3.3 WGA_854

comments.body: Thanks for move the issue to Titanium Community and sorry for my mistake when I posted.

Hi,

Please can you provide a complete runnable sample for this? Either as a simple app.js, or project.

Also, could you try against 3.0.2 GA to see if it still occurs?

Thanks!
